resources.string: Lazysodium is an effortless and easy-to-use open-source cryptography library for Java and Android. It\'s based on Libsodium, which is an excellent audited open-source C cryptography library. This app's purpose is to show you the capabilities of Lazysodium for Android and Libsodium.
Symmetric key encryption means that you encrypt and decrypt a message using one key. It\'s faster and less complicated than asymmetric key encryption, which usually requires at least 4 keys.
